maqras.text: And if He increases the provision of His servants, they would certainly commit injustice on the earth, but He sends down in amount that He wants. Indeed He is well informed and observant about His servants
And He is the One who sends down the rain after they lost hope and He spreads His mercy. And He is the praiseworthy protector
And among His signs is creation of the skies and the earth and whatever creature He scattered in them. And He is capable of bringing them together when He wants
And whatever tragedy happens to you is because of what your hands have done, and He excuses a lot
And you cannot weaken/escape (God) on the earth, and there is no protector or helper for you other than God
And among His signs are the sailing ships in the sea like the mountains/road signs
If He wants He makes the wind stand still, then they would become motionless on its back (sea's surface). Indeed there are signs in that for every patient and thankful (person)
Or He would destroy them for what they did, but He forgives a lot
And those who argue about Our signs should know that they have no way (or place) to escape
So everything you were given is an enjoyment of this world's life, but what is with God is better and more lasting for those who believed and trust in their Master
and those who avoid the great sins and indecencies, and they forgive when they are angry
and those who answered (the call of) their Master, and performed the mandatory prayer, and (conducted) their affairs by consultation among them, and spend (in God's way) from what We provided them
And those who defend themselves (or take revenge) when they suffer an injustice
(should know that) punishment of a bad deed is a bad deed like it, and anyone who excuses and settles then his reward is upon God. Indeed He does not like the wrongdoers
And certainly anyone who defends himself (or takes revenge), then there is no way against them
The way is only against those who do wrong to the people and unjustifiably commit injustice on the earth. They have a painful punishment
And anyone who is patient and forgives, indeed that is because of great determination (and willpower)
And whomever God misguides then he has no protector after Him. And you see the wrongdoers when they see the punishment, saying: is there any way to return

And you see them presented to it (the fire) humiliated from the disgrace, looking with a secret glance. And those who believed say: indeed the losers are those who lose themselves and their families on the resurrection day. Know that indeed the wrongdoers are in a lasting punishment
And there is no protector to help them other than God. And whomever God misguides, he has no way
Answer your Master before a day comes that it has no turning back by God. On that day there is no refuge for you and there is no denial for you

But if they stay away, We have not sent you as their guardian, you are only responsible for the preaching. And indeed when We make the human being taste from Our mercy he enjoys it, but if they suffer a tragedy because of what their hands sent ahead then indeed the human being is ungrateful
The rule of the skies and the earth belongs to God. He creates what He wants. He gives daughters to anyone He wants and gives the sons to anyone He wants
Or He combines them (giving them) sons and daughters and sons, and He makes anyone He wants infertile. Indeed He is knowledgeable and capable
